alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 7:16PM EST until December 21 at 12:08AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Bainbridge. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding occurs in the low lying areas across the river from Bainbridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest now, then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 8.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 730 AM EST.
